package mypack; class TotalEarnings extends Thread { int total1=0; public void run() { synchronized(this) { for(int i=0;i<=99;i++) { total1=total1+100; } this.notify(); } } } public class MovieBookApp { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub TotalEarnings t=new TotalEarnings(); t.start(); //System.out.println("Total Earning=" +total.te); synchronized(t) { try { t.wait(); } catch(Exception e){} System.out.println("Total Earning=" +t.total1); } } }
